query: How has my Body Mass Index changed since my cardiac arrest in June 2018?
resource_summaries: This record is an Observation of a patient's Body Mass Index (BMI) taken on December 28, 2020, with a value of 32.02 kg/m2.
answer: Your Body Mass Index (BMI) was 32.02 kg/m2 as of December 28, 2020. Unfortunately, there is no information provided in the summaries about your BMI at the time of your cardiac arrest in June 2018.
